data.lyric:
[ti:Single Saturday Night]
[ar:Cole Swindell]
[al:Single Saturday Night]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Single Saturday Night - Cole Swindell
[00:06.29]Lyrics by：Ashley Gorley/Mark Holman/Michael Hardy
[00:12.58]I was out taking shots
[00:15.62]Throwing down at the spot
[00:18.12]Three sheets just me and the guys
[00:21.48]Every single Saturday night
[00:23.14]I was killing time crushing cans
[00:27.21]Trying not to catch a tan
[00:29.56]'Cause I was under them neon lights
[00:33.11]Every single Saturday night yeah
[00:35.93]Everybody knew they could find me there
[00:41.23]And right out of the blue right out of nowhere
[00:45.13]Out of nowhere
[00:47.37]Sitting over in the corner baby I saw
[00:50.19]Pretty red lips working on a white claw
[00:53.24]Shaking to a little shook me all night long
[00:55.95]And I thought "Man what a beautiful sight"
[00:59.04]Ain't a morning you don't wake up in my shirt now
[01:01.88]Even holding hands walking out of church now
[01:04.82]Who'd of thought baby looking back that
[01:07.23]That would be my last single Saturday night
[01:11.52]Yeah
[01:14.17]My last single Saturday night
[01:22.22]And now when I'm out having a drink or two
[01:25.51]If they see me uh well they see you
[01:28.44]'Cause girl I got you by my side
[01:31.71]Every single Saturday night yeah
[01:34.18]Every now and then the boys tell me they miss me
[01:40.01]Oh but they all get it 'cause they were right there with me
[01:43.63]Yeah with me when
[01:45.76]Sitting over in the corner baby I saw
[01:48.79]Pretty red lips working on a white claw
[01:51.77]Shaking to a little shook me all night long
[01:54.49]And I thought "Man what a beautiful sight"
[01:57.63]Ain't a morning you don't wake up in my shirt now
[02:00.38]Even holding hands walking out of church now
[02:03.41]Who'd of thought baby looking back that
[02:05.78]That would be my last single Saturday night
[02:09.38]The last time that I'd by a drink for a girl I'd never met before
[02:14.30]I wasn't looking for love when I walked through the door
[02:17.39]But d**n if I didn't find what I wasn't even looking for
[02:26.76]Sitting over in the corner baby I saw
[02:29.72]Pretty red lips working on a white claw
[02:32.65]Shaking to a little shook me all night long
[02:35.34]And I thought "Man what a beautiful sight"
[02:38.69]Ain't a morning you don't wake up in my shirt now
[02:41.35]Look at us even picking out a church now
[02:44.37]Who'd of thought baby looking back that
[02:46.88]That would be my last single Saturday night
[02:51.01]Yeah
[02:53.88]My last single Saturday night
data.trans:
[ti:Single Saturday Night]
[ar:Cole Swindell]
[al:Single Saturday Night]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:06.29]//
[00:12.58]我外出饮酒作乐
[00:15.62]在酒吧里酣快畅饮
[00:18.12]我和朋友喝到酩酊大醉
[00:21.48]每个单身周六之夜 都是如此
[00:23.14]我消磨时光 啤酒一罐接着一罐下肚
[00:27.21]尽情放纵 可我的皮肤不会晒黑
[00:29.56]因为我置身于绚丽的霓虹灯里
[00:33.11]每个单身周六之夜 都是如此
[00:35.93]朋友都知道在这里能找到我
[00:41.23]出乎意料 不经意之间
[00:45.13]不经意之间
[00:47.37]坐在角落里的你映入我的眼帘
[00:50.19]你诱人的红唇紧贴着White Claw饮料的瓶口
[00:53.24]你跟着音乐随意摇摆 让我整晚神魂颠倒
[00:55.95]我陷入沉思 天啊 多么迷人呀
[00:59.04]每天清晨 你穿着我的衬衫醒来
[01:01.88]如今我们甚至会手牵着手走出教堂
[01:04.82]回首过去 谁曾料到
[01:07.23]那是我度过的最后一个单身周六之夜
[01:11.52]//
[01:14.17]我最后一个单身周六之夜
[01:22.22]如今我外出喝上一两杯的时候
[01:25.51]如果他们看见我 那他们也会见到你
[01:28.44]因为我一定让你陪在我身边
[01:31.71]每个单身周六之夜 都是如此
[01:34.18]有时 朋友们告诉我 他们十分想念我
[01:40.01]可他们都明白 因为他们与我亲密无间
[01:43.63]与我形影不离
[01:45.76]坐在角落里的你映入我的眼帘
[01:48.79]你诱人的红唇紧贴着White Claw饮料的瓶口
[01:51.77]你跟着音乐随意摇摆 让我整晚神魂颠倒
[01:54.49]我陷入沉思 天啊 多么迷人呀
[01:57.63]每天清晨 你穿着我的衬衫醒来
[02:00.38]如今我们甚至会手牵着手走出教堂
[02:03.41]回首过去 谁曾料到
[02:05.78]那是我度过的最后一个单身周六之夜
[02:09.38]这是最后一次 我请一个素未谋面的女孩喝酒
[02:14.30]当我走进酒吧大门 我并未打算开始一段恋情
[02:17.39]如果我没有对你一见倾心 那我会抱憾终生
[02:26.76]坐在角落里的你映入我的眼帘
[02:29.72]你诱人的红唇紧贴着White Claw饮料的瓶口
[02:32.65]你跟着音乐随意摇摆 让我整晚神魂颠倒
[02:35.34]我陷入沉思 天啊 多么迷人呀
[02:38.69]每天清晨 你穿着我的衬衫醒来
[02:41.35]看看现在的我们已经开始挑选结婚的教堂
[02:44.37]回首过去 谁曾料到
[02:46.88]那是我度过的最后一个单身周六之夜
[02:51.01]//
[02:53.88]我最后一个单身周六之夜
